Contradict fact: The claim falsely attributes a quote to Vice President Kamala Harris that she did not make.
Lack enough support: There is no evidence or record of Vice President Harris making the quoted statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Biden administration will defund the Department of Veterans Affairs in favor of supporting refugee families and asylum seekers, which is not supported by any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim can be explained as a false attribution made by a Facebook user.
